page.title: 04Watford: Some changes
page.content: In our area many old buildings were were being knocked down and new ones built on the same site. Houses near the{High St.}have been cleared and a large supermarket built there instead.The{Odeon}cinema has been knocked down to be replaced by shops.Detached houses in{Cassio Road} are being replaced by blocks of flats. The{Peace Memorial Hospital}built in 1920 to replace the smaller one in Victoria Road has now itself been replaced by a larger hospital. {Holy Rood Church School}is being pulled down.Our own school {Chater Junior}will be pulled down in 1987 and replaced on a new site in{Addiscombe Rd.} The whole area seems to be one of a changing land use.No building was more than 100 years old.
